column3: Very nice personell, good service, clean room, spacey elevators, great price!
Comfortable stay. Breakfast is included in the price of the room. Free wifi. It was a good overall experience.
Great value for money. Staff is fine but a bit special, Belarussian style. For example, cleaning crew wouldn't change my towels but argue about it. All in all very good for it's price
column4: Asking me for my room number when I borrowed a sewing needle, not changing towels and sheets on demand. Small things that as a European customer are a bit difficult to understand.

column3: Great value for money! Large clean room, comfortable bed. I have already booked the same hotel for my next stay!
Great breakfast, spacious room, big mall nearby, good sound-proofing, fridge in the room.
column4: Cigarette smell in the hall. No freezer in the fridge.

column3: My second stay at this hotel. All was great again. I really recommend East Time Hotel for other travelers. Thank you!
Value for money. Decent size room. . Could easy fit extra bed in room for family. Good location easy access to transport.
column4: There was a hole in bed clothes there were worn. Kettle in room would be nice to be able to make tea coffee.. Maybe remove  dressing table as one in two rooms deff fit extra single bed in.
